about_the_game:
THE PHYSICS IS A TOOL

A robot with multiple manipulator arms finds himself in a ruined space station. The way to salvation lies through utilizing physics to creatively manipulate objects, solving challenging puzzles and self-aware exploration.

FIND A WAY OUT

Investigate the mysterious and dangerous world of distant space on the edge of human scientific knowledge. Immerse yourself in the incredible spaces of a devastated station.

FIGURE OUT THE SYSTEMS

Upgrade your robotic limbs and strengthen your body to more effectively overcome obstacles, open previously inaccessible areas and defeat various enemies.

THE TRUTH BEHIND EXPERIMENTS

Dive deeper into the plot to uncover the secrets behind enigmatic researches. The storyline of the game is shaped by the choices you make as you progress.

short_description: Greeded is a stylish physics puzzle game about a long-armed robot in outer space. Change tools, mine resources and explore an abandoned space station.
